channel.title: shellcode on Fang Yuan

item.title: Duy Tan University CTF 2024
item.author: hcdtdayneg@gmail.com (d.thuc)
item.description: Pwn shellcode 1 Analysis It’a Shellcoding Challenge with a seccomp filter. # line CODE JT JF K # ================================= # 0000: 0x20 0x00 0x00 0x00000004 A = arch # 0001: 0x15 0x00 0x0a 0xc000003e if (A != ARCH_X86_64) goto 0012 # 0002: 0x20 0x00 0x00 0x00000000 A = sys_number # 0003: 0x35 0x00 0x01 0x40000000 if (A < 0x40000000) goto 0005 # 0004: 0x15 0x00 0x07 0xffffffff if (A != 0xffffffff) goto 0012 # 0005: 0x15 0x06 0x00 0x00000000 if (A == read) goto 0012 # 0006: 0x15 0x05 0x00 0x00000001 if (A == write) goto 0012 # 0007: 0x15 0x04 0x00 0x00000002 if (A == open) goto 0012 # 0008: 0x15 0x03 0x00 0x0000003b if (A == execve) goto 0012 # 0009: 0x15 0x02 0x00 0x000000f0 if (A == mq_open) goto 0012 # 0010: 0x15 0x01 0x00 0x00000101 if (A == openat) goto 0012 # 0011: 0x06 0x00 0x00 0x7fff0000 return ALLOW # 0012: 0x06 0x00 0x00 0x00000000 return KILL open, read, write, execve syscall is blocked.
item.dc:creator: f4ng yu4n
